description: Llee was ecstatic to finally ditch his clingy, smothering girlfriend. He has been in the closet all his life and is finally trying to take a peak out from behind the door. He isnt even sure if he is bi or totally gay but he didnt mind experimenting a little bit with us. We had to start him off slow with a solo spanking scene but we made sure he at least penetrated his asshole with a dildo so he can warm up to the idea for next time.
title: Fun Buns
